message: It's a bit much to relate this concept to """"government funded healthcare"""". If there is such a thing as a """"death panel"""", it already exists at private insurance companies.

message: Climate change is one of the most pressing issues facing the world today. Current energy policy focuses on expanding oil and gas development through fracking and extensive pipeline infrastructure. This policy is not only threatening our climate, but drinking water and public health. As president would you continue these policies or work to develop a sustainable energy policy.

message: The people demanding charges for child abuse or negligence are only doing so because the gorilla died. They would be saying nothing and passing the video around turning it viral if the gorilla lived. If the zoo had tried to tranquilize the gorilla who then became more agitated and killed the boy they would be asking why the zoo didn't kill him and encouraging mom to sue the zoo for providing an unsafe environment. It is is very sad that we have gotten to the point where an animals life is more important than that of a child.
